subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|人|t1=man|木|t2=tree|ls=ic}} – a man leaning against a tree, resting.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[rest]]; to [[relax]]
# [[joyous]]; [[happy]]
# to [[stop]]; to [[cease]]
# to [[retire]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} to [[cast off]] one’s [[wife]] and send her [[home]]; to [[divorce]] one's wife
# [[do]] [[not]]; [[don't]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
